articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Slack stock spikes on reports of Salesforce deal
articles.description: Slack shares shot up as much as 28% Wednesday, despite being halted twice for volatility, following a report that Salesforce has been in talks to acquire the workplace messaging app. Salesforce shares were down more than 4% on the news.

articles.title: NYT: Justice Department examined Sen. Perdue's stock trades
articles.description: The Justice Department opened a probe into Georgia Sen. David Perdue's stock sales for possible insider trading earlier this year but declined to pursue charges, according to The New York Times.
